GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.17 to before v5.4.208
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix data-races around sysctl_tcp_mtu_probing.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.208 by commit f966773e13cdd3f12baa90071b7b660f6c633ccb, it was introduced in version v2.6.17 by commit 5d424d5a674f782d0659a3b66d951f412901faee. For more details please see the references link.
